c74object.name: tap.buffer.norm~
c74object.digest: Normalize the contents of a buffer~
c74object.description: tap.buffer.norm~ finds the hottest sample in the buffer (it looks at all channels when doing this), then it scales the buffer contents so that the hottest sample will become just slightly less than 1.

objarg.name: buffername
objarg.description: The name of a buffer to reference.
